about_the_game:
Have you ever imagined what it would be like to go back in time armed with the technology of the future? By hunting the mysterious Keepers you can learn more and more about the destructive power of Nesphera, energy comparable to the power of magic.

Challenge yourself through the Reconstruction System


Quick and easy job? Nothing could be more wrong. Gates of Nesphera create similar, yet different corridors every time you enter. But beware! Each Reconstruction will test the limits of your abilities. Become one of the legendary Wanderers and show what you are capable of!

Use Nesphera energy to grow in strength


As they say, what doesn't kill you makes you stronger. You'll have to learn how to handle acquired powers, modify them into new variations and push the limits of your abilities to become invincible and discover all the secrets of Nesphera.

Master the Arena simulation


Take a break from time travel to improve your skills in the Arena mode. Defeat waves of enemies and fight your way to god-like source of simulation to find an exit and discover new possibilities for your powers.

Find a way to destroy the mythical Keepers


Now it's time for the hardest part. A powerful Keeper awaits those that reach the end of a Reconstruction corridor. Those mythical beings wield the energy of the Nesphera in ways you've never seen before. You will have to find a way to deal with them, expose their weaknesses and use your wits and acquired skills. This is your only way to return to the future stronger.

name: Gates of Nesphera VR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 390
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10600 / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: Gates of Nesphera VR is an action roguelite-inspired experience inviting you to take possession of deadly energy of Nesphera. Traverse time tunnels in search of new sources of power, guarded by powerful Keepers, and grow in strength by wreaking havoc in the Arena.
